SEARCH
Package model.deckFactory

Class ObjectiveDeck

java.lang.Object
model.deckFactory.ObjectiveDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Deck
public class ObjectiveDeck extends Object implements Deck
Represents a deck of objective cards implementing the Deck interface. This class initializes and manages a list of ObjectiveCard objects.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • generate

      public void generate()
      Generates the deck by parsing ObjectiveCard objects from a JSON resource file. Cards are added to the deck from ID 87 to 102. Each card is parsed using ObjectiveCard.parse(int id) and added to the cards list. Any exceptions encountered during parsing or deck generation are propagated as RuntimeExceptions.
      Specified by:
      generate in interface Deck

    • addCard

      public void addCard(ObjectiveCard card)
      Adds a card to the back (tail/end) of the cards list.
      Parameters:
      card - .

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Shuffles the cards in the deck using Collections.shuffle().
      Specified by:
      shuffle in interface Deck

    • extract

      public ObjectiveCard extract()
      Removes and returns the first card in the deck. Throws an IllegalStateException if the deck is empty.
      Returns:
      The extracted ObjectiveCard.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the number of cards in the deck.
      Specified by:
      getSize in interface Deck
      Returns:

      public ObjectiveCard get(int i)

    • getCards

      public ArrayList<ObjectiveCard> getCards()
      Returns the entire list of ObjectiveCards in the deck.

    • getCard

      public ObjectiveCard getCard(int id)
      Retrieves a card from the deck based on its ID. This method is for testing purposes only.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the card to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The ObjectiveCard with the specified ID, or null if not found.
